label: ProductionUnit
comment: A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.

datatypeProperties.comment: The completion date of this production facility.
The construction date for this production facility.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A global identifier for this supply chain consignment item.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A production machine applicable to this facility production unit.
A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A dedicated production facility for this production unit.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
Input material applicable to this facility production unit.
An input product applicable to this facility production unit.
A manufacturer party for this production process.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
Output material applicable to this facility production unit.
An output product applicable to this facility production unit.
A physical location referenced for this facility production unit.
A trade party related to this facility production unit.
An organizational certificate specified for this facility production unit.
A process certificate for this specified chemical treatment.
A certificate specified for this product batch.
A product certificate specified for this distinct chemical.
A subcontractor for this trade party.
A production unit subordinate to this facility production unit.

referencedBy.comment: A facility production unit for this specified production device.
A facility production unit for this specified production device.
A facility production unit related to this referenced location.
A production unit subordinate to this facility production unit.
